description: Take a little daylight with you on your next night ride. If you can never have enough light when you hit the trails after dark, the Monteer 8000S is your light. Sitting at the very top of Magicshine’s impressive Monteer line, the 8000S has more than enough light for even the fastest descents. With 15 different modes across 3 different lighting styles, there is a mode for every part of the ride, from slow climb trails, to flowing single track and gnarly descents. And, the USB powered battery pack is easy to charge, making days of “good enough” batteries a thing of the past. The 8000S takes daylight out of the “can I go riding?” equation, with this on your bars darkness gets out of your way.Hybrid mode combines spot (21º spread) and flood (32º spread) lighting modes, spot and flood lighting modes can also on their own, all modes have 5 different levels: 100%, 50%, 25%, 10% and flashing.Hybrid mode 5 levels: 100% (1.3h at 8000 lumens), 50% (3.25h at 4400 lumens), 25% (6.3h at 2400 lumens), 10% (12h at 1000 lumens) and flash (7h at 1800 lumens). Note: The light will lock into the lowest setting when the power is 5% or less.Single button control is easy to use with gloves on and the last mode used is remembered for your next ride.USB rechargeable 10,000mAh battery straps to your frame.Battery doubles as a USB powerbank (5V, 2A output).4-level LED battery status light works when charging or in use.Machined aluminum housing with integrated heat sync reduces heat build up, and programmed thermal protection keeps the light from overheating.IPX5 weatherproofing keeps the light shining in even the heaviest downpours.Integrated Garmin ½ turn mount gives you lots of options to use existing mounts.Includes mounting straps for a variety of handlebar diameters (25.4mm, 28mm, 31.8mm, 35mm and aerobars).
name: Magicshine Monteer 8000S Front Light
